outputs.output_descr: Supply of reliable and safe freshwater for HA. Ihavandhoo, ADh. Mahibadhoo and GDh. Gadhdhoo ensured in a changing climate and capacity & awareness of general public and related institutions increased.

project_descr: INCREASING CLIMATE RESILIENCE THROUGH AN INTERGRTAED WATER RESOURCE MANAGMENT PROGRAMME IN HA.IHAVANDHOO, ADH.MAHIBADHOO AND GDH.GADHDHOO ISLAND
project_title: PIMS 4582 AF: INTEGRATED WATER RESOURCES MANAGEMENT
